name: Bearded Devil
damage_resistances: cold; damage from nonmagical, non-silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil attacks once with its beard and once with its glaive.

actions.name: Beard
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage  and the target is poisoned until the end of the devils next turn. While poisoned in this way  the target can't regain hit points.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or construct  it makes a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it receives an infernal wound and takes 5 (1d10) ongoing slashing damage. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack  the ongoing damage increases by 5 (1d10). A creature can spend an action to make a DC 12 Medicine check  ending the ongoing damage on a success. At least 1 hit point of magical healing also ends the ongoing damage.

special_abilities.name: Devils Sight
special_abilities.desc: The devils darkvision penetrates magical darkness.

special_abilities.name: Lawful Evil
special_abilities.desc: The devil radiates a Lawful and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
